page.title: 08Coughton Ford
page.content: At Coughton Ford the River Arrow runs over Coughton Cross Lane. It is set in beautiful countryside and is the perfect place for a picnic. Tables are provided and children can paddle in the Ford whilst grown-ups relax on the grass. The trees around are good for climbing or just admiring. There is a bridge crossing the Ford so wet feet aren't really necessary. Cars can go through so you have to be careful when you are paddling. People come to the ford for an outing from Birmingham and other nearby towns. The Ford is well-liked because of its beauty and tranquility. You can be very active or you can just be still and lazy. The sheer beauty of it attracts most people.
